name: Block Puzzle: Eliminate
description:
If you want to find a causal game to have a relax, choose Block Puzzle: Eliminate!
If you want to find a free and small game, Block Puzzle: Eliminate is just made for you!
Hope Block Puzzle: Eliminate can bring endless fun for you!

HOW TO PLAY
The player needs to be within a certain number of steps，Place the tetris to create and destroy full lines on the screen both vertically and horizontally.Your need to eliminate the tetris and collect the coins at the same time to get through。Your moves are limited, so you better use them wisely!

Every level has a different map，it look easy at start to help you learn it but afterwards you will have the think hard and consider your tactics.

FEATURES
-Casual, interesting, and addictive
-The game is simple，Having a great time at every age
-No time limit! You can be immersed in the infinite fun of Block Puzzle: Eliminate at any time.
-NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!Enjoy the game anytime, anywhere!
-Funny sound effects.
-Hours of fun, exciting play.
-Support all tablet devices.
-Drag and drop the tetris blocks into appropriate places in the screen.
-Totally free puzzle game.
